title: REST API Design Quiz
description: Test your understanding of REST API design principles from the Ktor capstone.

questions.question: Which HTTP method is used to create a new resource?
questions.explanation: POST is used to create new resources. GET retrieves, PUT updates, and DELETE removes resources.

questions.question: What status code should a successful DELETE request return?
questions.explanation: 204 No Content is the standard response for a successful DELETE -- the resource has been removed and there's no content to return.
